description:
Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh’s house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger’s ship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il Re dei pirati e il suo braccio destro
Roger and Rayleigh: The King of the Pirates and His Right Hand Man
Roger et Rayleigh : le Roi des pirates et son bras droit
Roger to Rayleigh: Kaizoku Ou to Sono Migiude
Роджер и Рэйли! Король пиратов и его Правая рука
روجر وريلي! ملك القراصنة وذراعه اليمنى!
ロジャーとレイリー 海賊王とその右腕
